author.tagline: Jaydee Bourne, Attorney-at-Law Msc Corporate & Commercial Law

heading: Understand why credit unions merge
description: Attorney-at-law Jaydee Bourne explains the strategic reasons behind credit union mergers, offering a clear understanding of how combining resources can benefit members and communities.

author.tagline: Dwayne Devonish, Professor of Management and Organis. Behaviour, UWI

heading: How IMF Interventions Are Impacting Credit Unions
description: Professor Dwayne Devonish provides a detailed look at how recent IMF involvement in Barbados may influence local credit unions, offering strategies to adapt to potential challenges.

author.tagline: Tamika Burton, BSc in Economics and Accounting

heading: Achieving Balance in a Post-Pandemic World
description: Tamika Burton, BSc in Economics and Accounting, explores strategies for maintaining a healthy work-life balance in response to the workforce changes due to COVID-19.

author.tagline: Antonio Arthur, MIS Manager, BWUCCU Msc Business Admin. Finance

heading: Explore The Role of AI in the Future of Credit Unions
description: Antonio Arthur, MIS Manager, explores how artificial intelligence is set to transform credit unions, from improving customer service to optimizing internal operations.

heading: Defining Capital and Why It Matters to Your Credit Union
description: The Financial Services Commission breaks down the concept of capital and its critical role in maintaining your credit unionâ€™s stability and growth, helping you better understand how strong capital can safeguard your institution.
